title: Date & Time
date_time_setting_valid_ntp: Please enter a valid IP address or domain name
strongSuccessMsg: Date & Time settings has been saved successfully. It will take few seconds to bring up the interface again. Please close this browser session and open a new browser session.
general_date_timethis_field_is_used_to_s: This field is used to set the date and time on the BMC.
This field is used to set the timezone of the BMC.
general_date_timethis_field_is_used_to_c: This field is used to configure a primary NTP server to use when automatically setting the date and time.
This field is used to configure a secondary NTP server to use when automatically setting the date and time.
general_date_timethis_field_is_used_to_e: You can select to have the time automatically synchronized to a NTP server (or two), which you can configure below.
This field is used to enable/disable the use of PTP servers to automatically set the date and time.
general_date_timethis_field_is_used_to_c: This field is used to configure a  PTP server interface to use when automatically setting the date and time.
This field is used to configure a  PTP Preset type to use when automatically setting the date and time.
This field is used to configure a  PTP Transport type to use when automatically setting the date and time.
This field is used to configure a  PTP Ipmode type to use when automatically setting the date and time.
This field is used to configure a Unicast ip when ipmode is unicast and server to use when automatically setting the date and time.
This field is used to configure a  PTP Delay Mechanism type to use when automatically setting the date and time.
This field is used to configure a Inbound latency of the  server to use when automatically setting the date and time.
This field is used to configure a PTP outbound latency server to use when automatically setting the date and time.
This field is used to configure a priority of PTP clock to use when automatically setting the date and time.
This field is used to configure a max master capacity of the PTP clock to use when automatically setting the date and time.
This field is used to configure a PTP clock to not reset if jump is more then 1 second, use when automatically setting the date and time.
This field is used to configure a PTP log request delay,use when automatically setting the date and time.
samentpserver: Primary and Secondary NTP Server Can not be Same
saveConfirmLabel: Saving Date & Time settings will close this session. Please reconnect using new browser session after applying the changes. Do you want to proceed?
invalidserver: Temporary Failure In Synchronizing With NTP Server!
hlp_select_time_zone: Choose the Time Zone either by using the drop-down option or by hovering over the map and double-clicking on a location name.
hlp_manual:
Note:
If the time zone is selected from the group of Manual offset (GMT/ETC time zones), the interactive map selection feature will be disabled.
The new Time Zone settings will be reflected on the page only after being saved.
